name: v1_helicopter
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool helicopter_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Detailed technical specs for a wide range of helicopter models. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/helicopter.
API description: API Ninjas Helicopter API endpoint. Returns a list of helicopter specs that match the given parameters.

At least one of the following parameters (excluding the limit parameter) must be set.

max_height.description: Maximum height of the helicopter in feet.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

min_height.description: Minimum height of the helicopter in feet.

max_length.description: Maximum length of the helicopter in feet.

min_length.description: Minimum length of the helicopter in feet.

min_speed.description: Minimum maximum air speed in knots.

min_range.description: Minimum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

max_range.description: Maximum range of the helicopter in nautical miles.

max_speed.description: Maximum maximum air speed in knots.

manufacturer.description: Company that designed and built the helicopter. Default is 'Bell'.
